channel.title: Windows on Goofing Osamu
channel.description: Recent content in Windows on Goofing Osamu

item.title: Windows from Linux (1)
item.description: Windows from Linux There are few ways to access Windows resources. Install Microsoft Windows into a disk partition and make it dual-bootable. Use Windows 365 to use it from web browsers Run Office 365 application in Wine Other tips Dual boot Windows installation from Linux Creation of Windows USB installation media on GNU + Linux platform can be automated by using https://github.com/WoeUSB/WoeUSB. Let’s see what is involved behind “Windows from Linux” as below.
